Description:

ORION: Dino Horde - indie sci-fi shooter from the studio Spiral Game Studios. 
The game offers the user the power to unleash the ancient inhabitants of the 
planet Earth - dinosaurs that crawled out of their caves and raged in earnest. 
You can play either alone or with friends over the network. In ORION: Dino Horde 
await you on an exciting journey of cosmic reality, hundreds of versions of weapons, 
military equipment and much more.
